name: ciagneis-GameJam2021
description:
-Created for Spartasoft Fall Weekend Game jam 2021 by Bella Ciagne, Baxter Deni, Marshall Gaines, Vi Luong, and Anna Sheahan

Premise:

You, the Headless Horsemen, must defend your stolen stash of Halloween candy from the neighborhood's zombie children. Use your flying head to shoot and knock over the children before they eat all the candy or swarm you!

  • Worked as the primary designer helping with mechanics and the map along with the game concept.
  • Implemented the Main Menu,  Pause screen, and enhanced the Neighborhood setting.
